beer.beer_description:
Azimuth is a directional IPA. It guides you further through your beer journey keeping your bearings straight and true to the cause. Don’t drink too much, lest you become a horizontal bearing.

A zesty orange pith nose with flavours of peach and apricot skins, a hint of caramel honeysuckle and spring gorse flowers.

items.badge_description: Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 195 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 40.

items.badge_description:
Ready, set, gold! Are you ready for a Podium Party?!?

At Untappd, we love checking in beers (some say for sport), and this year, there's an easy way to earn your spot on the podium.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 475 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 96! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 445 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 90!

Grimsby, NE Lincolnshire.  
fozzy21.blogspot.com  The Beermonster's Blog.

user.bio: “Here’s to alcohol: the cause of, and solution to, all of life’s problems.” -- Homer Simpson
You can't beat a true Belgian Tripel!
Enjoying beer in all forms, craft especially. Also like a drop of whisky.
Recent convert to homebrewing and also like to try lots of different beers but primarily Belgian beers.
